renderpass.code:
void mainImage(out vec4 z, vec2 u) {
    for(
        vec2 A=u-u, C=z.xw, B=z.wx*1.7, G, i=A ;
        i.x++ < 13. ;
        C = G/3.
    )
        G = A+B,
        A = ( i.y = dot( normalize( u/iResolution.y -G), normalize(B+B-A))
            ) < -.5 ? A : B + C,
        B = i.y > .5 ? z.g = 1. -                                z.b, B : C,
        z = 1.4 - z; } /*
Thanks coyote!




old version :

define mainImage(z,u)                              \
    vec2 A=u-u,B=A,C=z.xw, G, b = u/iResolution.y;        \
    B.x = 1.7;                               \
    for(float a, i=0. ; i++ < 13. ; C = (b-G)/3. )  \
        a = dot( normalize(G = b-A-B), normalize(B+B-A) ), \
        A = a < -.5 ? A : B + C,    \
        B = a >  .5 ? z.g = 1. - z.b, B : C,        \
        z = 1.4 - z*/
renderpass.name: Image
